name: TouchStone Software
overview: TouchStone Software Corporation, along with its subsidiaries, develops, markets, and supports a line of computer problem-solving utility software and supporting products, and engineering services in the United States and internationally. The companyâ€™s products include DriverAgent, a PC hardware that scan, analyze, and update technology specific to device drivers; BIOS Agent Upgrade solutions that allow end-users to keep their systems current by enabling the latest technology; and CheckIt 7.0 Portable Edition, a modular PC testing and diagnostics tool designed for computer manufacturers, resellers, and repair centers. Its products also comprise ISA and PCI Postcard, a plug-in diagnostic card to aid IT professionals and PC end-users to determine the causes of system failures; and RegistryWizard, a tool for detecting and correcting errors in the Windows registry. The company also owns and operates a network of Internet Web properties. Its customers include end-users, educational and financial institutions, designers and manufacturers of motherboards, PC systems, and other microprocessor-based or embedded devices. TouchStone Software markets its products via a direct inbound and outbound sales force and the Internet. The company was founded in 1982 and is based in North Andover, Massachusetts. As of July 1, 2008, TouchStone Software Corp. operates as a subsidiary of Phoenix Technologies Ltd.
